short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide job listings from specified companies on LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With version 3.0 you can highlight any company's job listing that you want to follow.

JobGuardian: Precision Filtering for LinkedIn Job Searches

Navigate your job search on LinkedIn more efficiently with JobGuardian! Our Chrome extension is designed to streamline your job hunt by allowing you to hide job listings from companies you're not interested in. With JobGuardian, you take control of what you see, tailoring job searches to match only your career preferences and desired employers.

Key Features:

Custom Filters: Easily add companies to your exclusion list and never see an unwanted job listing again. JobGuardian makes your job feed cleaner and more relevant to your career goals.
Dynamic Updates: JobGuardian works dynamically as you browse, continuously filtering out listed companies in real-time, ensuring a smooth and relevant browsing experience.
User-Friendly Interface: Add or remove companies from your filter list with just a few clicks through a simple, intuitive popup interface.
Privacy-Focused: Your filter preferences are stored locally on your browser to ensure privacy and speed, with no external servers involved.
Whether you're actively seeking new opportunities or just keeping an eye on the market, JobGuardian helps you stay focused on opportunities that matter to you. Enhance your LinkedIn job search experience by filtering out the noise with JobGuardian!
